reviewText: Really helpful highly recommended Rough Trip: A Spiritual Odyssey Part 1
Very interesting and informative. Simple techniques that are easy and fun to follow.

it inspired me to seek out Berceli and take a training from him in Chicago the end of February. Working as a nurse for 40 years in psych has shown me that medications do not work in treating PTSD and I am excited to learn more about TRE and hopefully share my knowledge with the countless people who suffer from anxiety, trauma, and PTSD.
I was very happy with this Dvd. Great explanation of trauma and it's effects on the body. It offers a holistic path to recovery that intergrates the healing of mind and body
I got recommended this method through a yoga teacher I met at a buddhist meditation retreat, and seems to be a great way of process for letting trauma leave the body.
